awayawen adukala badu layisthuwata anuwa ee meseya. 1.indhana ha wahana - maruti kali dekathunak aran aduwata thel gahan mechchara kal nogiya pathiwalath badu wikunannata yanna hakkeya. 2.pan piti - hodata ambaarawa idiaabba piti,aappa piti arawa mewa kiya goni pitin gena hala aaye pakat kara ikiniya hakkeya. 3.sini 4 pan -panpiti ha sini kalawam kara guli gasa puchcha bekari pan kadayak mola issarahin eliya hakiya. 5-kaha 6-miris 7 -koththamalli -ambaarawa miris kudu,thunapahakudu,kahakudu 8-umbalakada -pawdar kudu ho kata aspa gananata... 9-halmassan- pawudar kota issan/dallan/malu/polos oona rasakarakayakata yodanne halmassaya. 10-mun ata-thripaposha 11-udu -udu piti 12-kiri piti- issarahin kiwu bekariye piti moli anannath,ara pakat karana halpiti.aappa piti eewawa mewaye rahas rasaya enna danneth mewaya. 13-sastajan-panpiti gila ledamaragathe wu wita bonnata sastajan dungak raththaranya.

ratata, janathawata aadaraya karana dushanayata, wanchawata ha nasthiyata kisiseth hisa nonamana, awanka, ghruju deshapalana nawakayin pirisak bihi kirima mewara palath palana mathiwaranaya thulin shri lanka nidahas pakshaya apeksha karana bawa sadahan kala janadhipathithuma awanka, pirisidu saha janathawadi deshapalana wyaparayak sadaha sudusu pudgalayin thora ganimin anagathaye di yahapath aanduwak godanagima sadaha wana praweshaya mema mathiwaranaya thulin sanituhan kalayuthu bawa da kiya sitiyeya.

tiken tika loku weddi mage hithe aadara sithuwili pahala wenna gaththu wayasath ekka man hama welema prarthana karapu deyak thamayi mata godak aadare karana, mawa godak aaraksha karana kenek mata labewa kiyala.aadare kiyana de godakma oona man wage kenek wenuwen man hoyana jathiyema thawath kenekwa hoyanawata wada ara kathawe ena " hath pethi mala " hoyaganna eka wada lesi weyi kiyala ee hama welawakadima mage yati hitha mage prarthana walata ochcham kala.eeth man uthsahaya atha hariye na.awurudu ganak thisse mata hoya ganna amaru weyi kiyala magema hitha mata wihilu karapu ee lassana hath pethi mala man hamathanakama hewwa.hama ahumullak narama pira pira hewwe man ee hath pethi malamayi.eya kohema hari katawath nopenena, katawathma hoyaganna bari thanakata wela pipila athi kiyala mage udu hitha yati hithath ekka hari hariyata wada kala.
